Package no.hiof.webframework.application.tools

Class ImageUtility

java.lang.Object
no.hiof.webframework.application.tools.ImageUtility
Direct Known Subclasses:
Chatroom
public class ImageUtility extends Object
The ImageUtility class provides utility methods for handling image files in a web application. It contains methods for copying image files to designated paths, with support for max two images and overriding default images with new ones. It also reads from a config.properties to get the image paths fot the designated locations.

  • Method Details

    • copyImageFile

      protected static void copyImageFile(String sourcePath) throws ImageOverloadException
      Copies an image file from the given source path to a designated destination path, based on the current imageCounter. The imageCounter is incremented by 1 after a successful copy.
      Parameters:
      sourcePath - The path of the source image file to be copied.
      Throws:
      ImageOverloadException - Throws an ImageOverloadException if the imageCounter is 2 or greater, indicating that only two images are allowed to be added.

    • copyImageFile

      protected static void copyImageFile(String sourcePath, ImageType overrideImage) throws IOException
      Copies an image file from the given source path to a designated destination path, based on the ImageType enum parameter The destination path is read from the config.properties file based on the ImageType enum parameter. The file is copied with the REPLACE_EXISTING option, which overwrites any existing file with the same name.
      Parameters:
      sourcePath - The path of the source image file to be copied
      overrideImage - The ImageType enum indicating which image to override with the copied file
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the ImageType enum parameter is not one of the defined enums in the ImageType class
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while copying the file
